statements: SELECT client_id, progress FROM client_progress;
SELECT client_id, goals FROM client_progress WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT goals, recommendations FROM client_progress ORDER BY goals DESC;
SELECT client_id, progress, goals, recommendations FROM client_progress WHERE progress LIKE '%completed%';
SELECT * FROM client_progress WHERE recommendations IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM client_progress;
SELECT client_id, progress FROM client_progress ORDER BY client_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM client_progress WHERE progress='Completed';
SELECT client_id, goals FROM client_progress WHERE goals IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_id, progress, recommendations FROM client_progress WHERE progress='In Progress' ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients_progress;
SELECT client_name, progress_status FROM clients_progress WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, goal_description FROM clients_progress ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date < NOW();
SELECT client_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE client_id = 3 ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT client_name, progress_status FROM clients_progress;
SELECT client_name, progress_status, goal_description FROM clients_progress WHERE progress_status='In Progress';
SELECT client_name, progress_status, recommendation_text FROM clients_progress LEFT JOIN recommendations ON clients_progress.client_id = recommendations.client_id;
SELECT client_name, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM clients_progress JOIN recommendations ON clients_progress.client_id = recommendations.client_id ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND recommendation_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT name, age, email FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, email FROM clients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE goals_achieved = TRUE;
SELECT client_id, recommendation FROM recommendations WHERE relevance_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT name, age FROM clients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT c.name, p.date, p.steps_completed FROM clients c JOIN progress p ON c.client_id = p.client_id WHERE p.goals_achieved = TRUE;
SELECT r.recommendation, r.relevance_score, c.name AS client_name FROM recommendations r JOIN clients c ON r.client_id = c.client_id ORDER BY r.relevance_score DESC;
SELECT c.name, COUNT(p.progress_id) AS total_progress FROM clients c LEFT JOIN progress p ON c.client_id = p.client_id GROUP BY c.name HAVING total_progress > 2;
SELECT * FROM ClientProgress ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT client_id, progress FROM ClientProgress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT recommendation FROM PersonalizedRecommendations WHERE recommendation_id = 3;
SELECT name, age FROM ClientDetails WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT client_id, goal_description FROM ClientGoals WHERE deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT client_id, progress, goal FROM ClientProgress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation FROM PersonalizedRecommendations WHERE recommendation_id < 10;
SELECT client_id, name, age, email FROM ClientDetails WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT client_id, goal_description, deadline FROM ClientGoals WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31';
SELECT client_id, progress, goal FROM ClientProgress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, name, email FROM clients WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT name, join_date FROM clients ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT description, target_date FROM goals WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(goal_id) AS total_goals FROM goals GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM clients WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM goals WHERE target_date >= '2023-01-01' AND completion_date IS NULL ORDER BY goal_id ASC;
SELECT c.name, g.description, p.status FROM clients c JOIN goals g ON c.client_id = g.client_id JOIN progress p ON g.goal_id = p.goal_id WHERE p.updated_at >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT r.content, g.description, c.name FROM recommendations r JOIN goals g ON r.goal_id = g.goal_id JOIN clients c ON g.client_id = c.client_id WHERE r.created_at >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY c.name, g.description;
